column4: anyone here able to help me get my windows xp box to connect to my ubuntu network? It sees the ubuntu network but it can't access the folders for some reason
you did give the linux user a samba password with 'sudo smbpasswd -a USERNAME' ?
i had it work when i shred a directory and clicked BOTH box's but not if i dident click any.. Unless you set a samba password for the user.
I set the permissions to allow writing and guest access
